subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Sergio García, who last year won the first sudden-death playoff in 21 years at the T.P.C. Sawgrass, hopes the familiar and friendly confines of the course will bring back his control.
snippet: Sergio García, who last year won the first sudden-death playoff in 21 years at the T.P.C. Sawgrass, hopes the familiar and friendly confines of the course will bring back his control.
